title: MD
biography: Prabhat Jha is a leading specialist in Epidemiology - Global mortality studies at Univ. of Toronto (India-origin).
aiSummary: Prabhat Jha is a epidemiology - global mortality studies specialist with an H-index of 110 at Univ. of Toronto (India-origin) (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet, New England Journal of Medicine, Nature reviews. Cancer. Based in India.
